question: Which is the largest combat exercise of the Indian Navy, which is being held in the Indian Ocean Region (IOR)?
explanation:
Theatre Level Operational Readiness Exercise (TROPEX-21) is the Indian Navyâ€™s largest exercise. It is being held in the Indian Ocean Region (IOR).
This month-long drill also includes joint exercises by ships and aircraft and other assets of the Indian Air Force, Army and the Indian Coast Guard in the IOR and the waters in the adjacent regions.
